subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Declared healthy for the Super Bowl after sustaining a concussion in the divisional round, Percy Harvin, a versatile Seahawks receiver, will now get a chance to deliver on the hype.
snippet: Declared healthy for the Super Bowl after sustaining a concussion in the divisional round, Percy Harvin, a versatile Seahawks receiver, will now get a chance to deliver on the hype.
